mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT left(code,2) sido_code, city sido_name FROM baseaddress ORDER BY sido_code
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(code,3,4) gugun_code, gugun gugun_name FROM baseaddress WHERE LEFT(code,2) = #{sido_code} ORDER BY gugun_code
SELECT DISTINCT RIGHT(code,4) code, dong FROM baseaddress WHERE SUBSTRING(code, 3, 4) = #{gugun_code} ORDER BY dong
SELECT no,dong,AptName,code,jibun FROM houseinfo WHERE dong LIKE (SELECT dong FROM baseaddress WHERE code = #{totalcode}) ORDER BY AptName
SELECT no, dong, AptName, buildYear, jibun FROM houseinfo WHERE AptName like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') AND dong like #{dongName} ORDER BY AptName
